CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL(Entity__r.Behavior_Level__c, "High"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015t00000006VM6", "Emo-High" , 15,15 ),
IF( ISPICKVAL(Entity__r.Behavior_Level__c, "Medium"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015t00000006VMB", "Emo-Medium" , 15,15 ),
IF( ISPICKVAL(Entity__r.Behavior_Level__c, "Low"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015t00000006VML", "Emo-Low" , 15,15 ), "" )))
CustomField.label: Behavior
